Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored the Kings to win based on their recent performance.
The duel between the Kings and Clippers was highlighted as a key matchup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is scheduled for Friday, 10 p.m. EST in Sacramento, California.
The Kings averaged 116.6 points per game while shooting 47.7% from the field and 36.6% from behind the arc last season.
The Clippers gave up 112.3 points per game while committing 18.5 fouls last season.
The Kings finished 46-36 overall and 30-22 in Western Conference play a season ago.
The Clippers went 51-31 overall, 9-7 in Pacific Division games and 26-15 on the road a season ago.
Others: Injuries: Kings - Devin Carter: out (shoulder), Kevin Huerter: day to day (illness), Orlando Robinson: out (mcl).
Clippers - Mo Bamba: out (knee), P.J. Tucker: out (personal), Kawhi Leonard: out (knee).
